fullName: Book Management API Validations: Audit log for book update
name: Audit log for book update

steps.name: Given  a user signs up and logs in successfully
User Signup: expected 200, actual 200. User created successfully. Response: {"message":"User created successfully"}

User Login: expected 200, actual 200. Login successful. Response: {"access_token":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJib29rZmxvd191c2VyXzE3NDkwMTYwMzg2ODNAbWFpbC5jb20iLCJleHAiOjE3NDkwMTc4Mzl9.wmJEgcC4do08uPZXCUTHd3q_311BbDFJBv7BeTZHPR4","token_type":"bearer"}
Given  a book payload with name "AuditBook", author "Alice", year 2024, and summary "To be updated" is prepared
Prepared book payload: Book{id=39833, name='AuditBook', author='Alice', published_year=2024, book_summary='To be updated', cover_image_url='null'}
When  user sends a request to create a new book
Book creation request response: Status: 200, Body: {"book_summary":"To be updated","id":39833,"author":"Alice","published_year":2024,"name":"AuditBook"}
When  user sends a request to create a new book
Book creation request response: Status: 500, Body: Internal Server Error
And  user fetches audit logs for the created book
Fetched audit logs for book 39833, Response: {"detail":"Not Found"}
